author: jpavel
body:
Having moved the tau payloads to the production database, tau sequence is switching input for all its MVA discriminators and at the same time removing the root files from the CMSSW. The former behaviour can be restored by
1) re-including the root files
2) adding the 2 lines below to the config python to swich the input

```
from RecoTauTag.Configuration.switchMVAtoDB_cfi import switchMVAtoDB
process = switchMVAtoDB(process)
```

No changes in tau performance expected as the input should be identical.

@andrew314
@veelken
title: Switching default tau MVA input to ConfDB
